name: Tomato Run (takaneichinose)
description:
Tomato Run Description

Tomato Run is an endless running game, where the player should just have to get the highest running score.

This game is made entirely in PICO-8.

Controls
  • Z - Jump
  • Left Arrow - Slow down
  • Right Arrow - Move forward

The above controls is when you're playing with keyboard.

  • O - Jump
  • Left Arrow - Slow down
  • Right Arrow - Move forward

The above controls is when you're playing with mobile/smartphone.

Instruction

One day, Tommy the tomato was just surprised that he suddenly got a consciousness. He was a fruit, so he have no idea what to do in this world. For the meantime, he only know how to run, and jump.

Tommy just can move forward without knowing what are the dangers ahead of him. Try to avoid the pitfall while moving forward. Falling will hurt Tommy. Also try to avoid the crows that area trying to eat Tommy.

Tommy can step on the crow but can't hurt it. Tommy will just just again after stepping.
